Usable Items
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: Monster Rancher DS FAQ: Item Lists: Usable Items
By Thorr on Sunday, August 8, 2010 - 09:41 am:

These items are usable on your ranch.

The final 6 columns tell you the possible places to find the item. A year number in the Shop column indicates that the item can be found in the Market after that date.

ItemEffectShopTorrTourneyErrantryFarmEvent
Banana RingSlightly reduces FatigueY-YY--
Medicinal HerbModerately reduces Fatigue(1002)-YY--
Honey MushroomGreatly reduces Fatigue(1004)-YY--
Monster CandySlightly reduces StressY-YY--
ElixirModerately reduces Stress(1003)-YY--
Sea AngelGreatly reduces Stress(1005)-YY--
Soda LozengeIncreases WitsY-YY--
Worm FungusReduces WitsY-YY--
Roll CakeIncreases DependencyY-YY--
Shock RockDecreases DependencyY-YY--
Fatty MeatIncreases WeightY-YY--
Blade Weed Reduces WeightY-YY--
RosemoonIncreases popularity gain next tourneyY-YY--
Hot LozengeIncrease SKI/SPD for 1 Battle but lowers Lifespan(1010)YYY--
Bean FlourIncrease POW/INT for 1 Battle but lowers Lifespan(1012)YYY--
Dragon ScaleIncrease DEF/LIF for 1 Battle but lowers Lifespan(1013)YYY--
Spook BugIncrease POW/INT gains for 1 week but lowers Lifespan(1015)YYY--
Red MangoIncrease DEF/LIF gains for 1 week but lowers Lifespan(1016)YYY--
Bell FlowerIncrease SKI/SPD gains for 1 week but lowers Lifespan(1017)YYY--
Pow Fruit Increase POW by 2--YY--
Int fruit Increase INT by 2--YY--
Skill fruitIncrease SKI by 2--YY--
Spd fruitIncrease SPD by 2--YY--
Def fruitIncrease DEF by 2--YY--
Life FruitIncrease LIF by 2--Y-Y-
Silver PeachLifespan +25 weeks-Y-Y--
Golden PeachLifespan +50 weeks---Volco-Y

By VenomousX on Sunday, August 8, 2010 - 08:47 pm:

Can the peaches be found on any errantry or only certain ones?

By Thorr on Monday, August 9, 2010 - 04:35 am:

If I remember right, Silver peaches are in the Ice Ridge and Golden peaches are in the Volcano. (You need to use the golden peach to get a phoenix there.)

By Infernus on Tuesday, August 10, 2010 - 01:54 am:

I got a Silver Peach on 'Angsworth Way.' That's fortunate considering that it's open early, and has one of the simpler maps (I'm finding errantrys to be unbelievably frustrating).

Also, one item missing is 'Bell Flower.'

By Celest on Friday, August 20, 2010 - 09:02 am:

Torr, the person who comes to your ranch to sell rare items, also sells peaches on occasion.

By HappyHippo123 on Friday, August 20, 2010 - 11:04 am:

the Red Mango ect items also are added to the regular shop later, not sure what the condition is. She just showed up one day and said she had some new items and that she had to get permision from BOMBA to sell them.

By Thorr on Friday, August 20, 2010 - 11:38 am:

Just time. Once you hit certain year milestones, more items are available.

By 321228322 on Friday, August 20, 2010 - 12:25 pm:

Hot Lozenge-Increase Skill/Speed for week lowers Lifespan.
Spook Bug-Power/Intelligence go up for week, Lifespan Decrease
Dragon Scale-Defense Life Increase for week, lifespan decrease
Red Mango-Defense/Life go up for week, lifespan drops
Bell Flower-Skill/Speed go up for a week, Lifespan drops
Life Fruit-Life increases slightly
Intelligence Fruit-Intelligence increases slightly

By Celest on Friday, August 20, 2010 - 07:34 pm:

Shock Rock - Decreases dependency
Fatty Meat - Makes your monster fatter
Blade Weed - Makes your monster thinner
Speed Fruit - Speed increases slightly
Power Fruit - Power increases slightly
Skill Fruit - Skill increases slightly
Defense Fruit - Defense increases slightly
